title: Steve Mentoring #1, Trump Tulsa Rally, D.L. Hughley COVID-19 and more.
itunes:title: Steve Mentoring #1, Trump Tulsa Rally, D.L. Hughley COVID-19 and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The crew is here and J. Anthony Brown is wearing a Kangol. Did Fool #1 pop-ting Fool #2? Let's see! The Chief Love Officer tackles a 2 baby mama situation and more. Do Big Booties Matter at the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem or nah? Actor D.L. Hughley tests positive for COVID-19. Jamie Foxx will play Mike Tyson in an upcoming biopic. Steve's mentoring program is the #1 trending Facebook item online. Congrats Uncle Steve! What is is Kung-flu? Did 45 get punked by TikTok teens? How will football both college and NFL resume this fall amidst the pandemic? There is some racial controversy in Baton Rouge, LA. Trump posts a doctored video. Today as the show closes, Big Dog reminds The Steve Harvey Nation about our greatest right and why we should vote, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
